title: Gloria The Gift Of Life
lyrics:
For the gift of life
for the air we breathe
for the tears we cry
for every melody
for the times we pray
even when we bleed

for the morning sun

I raise my voice to sing



Gloria, gloria, gloria, gloria

Un amore eterno I'm forever cryin' for

Gloria, gloria



You were just a child

only yesterday

and now here we are

you're on your wedding day

like a million stars

you light up the sky

you are a miracle

I can't believe my eyes



Gloria, gloria, gloria, gloria

Un amore eterno I'm forever cryin' for

Gloria, gloria



(Alleluia, alleluia, un amore eterno)

Gloria, gloria, gloria (Alleluia, alleluia, un amore eterno)

Gloria, gloria, gloria, gloria (Alleluia, alleluia, un amore eterno)



Un amore eterno

un amore immenso

gloria, gloria, gloria, gloria
